## Chett's Cold Brew

1. Coarse grid 100g whole bean medium or light roast coffee.
2. Add coffee and 700mL cold water to french press. Mix and let sit overnight

![IMG_20230129_182753691](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6870125/216200687-329124a6-f760-4053-805f-f81e46ad912e.jpg)

3. Plunge the french press.
4. Slowly pour the coffee over a mesh strainer and two bamboo filters. This level of filtering will really improve the flavor.

![IMG_20230130_064335065](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6870125/216200784-179cd708-72c7-4fb3-b517-f3d81a55c957.jpg)

5. You now have cold brew concentrate! 
6. Store in the fridge for up to 7 days in a ceramic or glass container.

### Hot coffee
Mix about 1/5 of the concentrate to 4/5 sub-boiling water.

### Cold coffee
Pour about 1/8-1/4 cup over a glass of ice. Add milk to fill up the glass.

### Ingredients
We use Illy coffee and bamboo filters.
